name: bulma-clean-theme
description: This is a clean and simple Jekyll Theme built with the Bulma framework, providing a modern looking site to start with.

scripts.start: rmdir /s /q .\_site && rmdir /s /q .\.jekyll-cache && npm update -g && npm install && bundle update && bundle install && npm install && bundle exec jekyll serve --incremental --trace --watch

author: chrisrhymes
